result.eng: The accommodaton costs were higher than we thought.
result.ga: Bhí costas an lóistín níos airde ná mar a cheap muid
result.orig: Bhí costas an lóistín níos airde ná mar a cheap muid
result.html: Bhí costas an lóistín níos airde ná mar a cheap muidThe accommodaton costs were higher than we thought.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí costas an lóistín níos airde ná mar a ċeap muidThe accommodaton costs were higher than we thought.

result.ga: Cheap siad ina uachtarán é
result.html: Cheap siad ina uachtarán éThey appointed him president.
result.ponchtml: Ċeap siad ina uaċtarán éThey appointed him president.

result.eng: I almost thought I wouldn't be paid.
result.ga: Is beag a cheap mé go n-íocfaí mé
result.orig: Is beag a cheap mé go n-íocfaí mé
result.html: Is beag a cheap mé go n-íocfaí méI almost thought I wouldn't be paid.
result.ponchtml: Is beag a ċeap mé go n-íocfaí méI almost thought I wouldn't be paid.

result.eng: This is way bigger than I thought.
result.ga: Tá sé seo i bhfad Éireann níos mó ná mar a cheap mé
result.orig: Tá sé seo i bhfad Éireann níos mó ná mar a cheap mé
result.html: Tá sé seo i bhfad Éireann níos mó ná mar a cheap méThis is way bigger than I thought.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé seo i ḃfad Éireann níos mó ná mar a ċeap méThis is way bigger than I thought.

result.ga: Ní mise a chum ná a cheap
result.orig: Ní mise a chum ná a cheap
result.html: Ní mise a chum ná a cheapIt wasn't my idea.
result.ponchtml: Ní mise a ċum ná a ċeapIt wasn't my idea.

result.eng: He was his school friends' laughing stock.
result.ga: Bhí sé ina cheap magaidh ag a chomhscoláirí
result.orig: Bhí sé ina cheap magaidh ag a chomhscoláirí
result.html: Bhí sé ina cheap magaidh ag a chomhscoláiríHe was his school friends' laughing stock.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé ina ċeap magaiḋ ag a ċoṁscoláiríHe was his school friends' laughing stock.

result.eng: He thought he'd faint from the sickness.
result.ga: Cheap sé go dtitfeadh sé i laige leis an tinneas
result.orig: Cheap sé go dtitfeadh sé i laige leis an tinneas
result.html: Cheap sé go dtitfeadh sé i laige leis an tinneasHe thought he'd faint from the sickness.
result.ponchtml: Ċeap sé go dtitfeaḋ sé i laige leis an tinneasHe thought he'd faint from the sickness.

result.eng: I thought it was silly of us to argue.
result.ga: Cheap mé gur sheafóideach an mhaise dúinn a bheith ag argóint
result.orig: Cheap mé gur sheafóideach an mhaise dúinn a bheith ag argóint
result.html: Cheap mé gur sheafóideach an mhaise dúinn a bheith ag argóintI thought it was silly of us to argue.
result.ponchtml: Ċeap mé gur ẛeafóideaċ an ṁaise dúinn a ḃeiṫ ag argóintI thought it was silly of us to argue.

result.eng: They made up a new name for her.
result.html: Cheap siad ainm nua diThey made up a new name for her.
result.ponchtml: Ċeap siad ainm nua diThey made up a new name for her.
